original: zang zing med pa'i chos ston pa /
analyzed: zang zing med pa'i chos ston pa /

analyzed: chos @3b zab mo'i bzod pa dam pa rtogs par khong du chud pa /

original: mi 'jigs pa chen po thob pa /

original: las kyi sgrib pa rgyun chad pa /
analyzed: las kyi sgrib pa rgyun chad pa /

original: las dang / nyon mongs pa dang / phyir rgol ba rab tu bcom pa /
analyzed: las dang / nyon mongs pa dang / phyir rgol ba rab tu bcom pa /

analyzed: pha rol po'i rgol ba thams cad kyis zil gyis mi non pa /

analyzed: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis rtogs par dka' ba /

analyzed: chos rab tu rtogs pas rnam par dbye zhing bstan pa la mkhas pa /

original: bskal pa grangs med pa nas smon lam shin tu brtsams pa /
analyzed: bskal pa grangs med pa nas smon lam shin tu brtsams pa /

original: bzhin 'dzum pa dang ldan pa /
analyzed: bzhin 'dzum pa dang ldan pa /
translated: He has a smiling face.

original: thog mar smra ba /
analyzed: thog mar smra ba /

original: khro gnyer med pa /
analyzed: khro gnyer med pa /

original: snyan cing 'jam pa'i tshig dang ldan pa /
analyzed: snyan cing 'jam pa'i tshig dang ldan pa /

original: pha rol la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs su brjod pa la mkhas pa /
analyzed: pha rol la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs su brjod pa la mkhas pa /
translated: He is skilled in speaking in verse and song to others.

original: spobs pa mi chod pa /
analyzed: spobs pa mi chod pa /
translated: His eloquence is uninterrupted.

original: 'khor mtha' yas pa zil gyis gnon pa'i mi 'jigs pa dang ldan pa /
analyzed: 'khor mtha' yas pa zil gyis gnon pa'i mi 'jigs pa dang ldan pa /

original: bskal pa bye ba mtha' yas par bstan pa'i ye shes kyis 'byung ba la mkhas pa /
analyzed: bskal pa bye ba mtha' yas par bstan pa'i ye shes kyis 'byung ba la mkhas pa /
translated: He is skilled in the knowledge of teaching that arises from infinite millions of eons.

original: chos thams cad sgyu ma dang / smig rgyu dang / chu zla dang / rmi lam dang / sgra brnyan dang / mig yor dang / nam mkha' dang / dri za'i grong khyer dang / sprul pa dang / gzugs brnyan lta bur khong du chud pa /

translated: He had realized that all phenomena are like illusions, mirages, reflections of the moon in water, dreams, echoes, optical illusions, space, cities of gandharvas, emanations, and reflections.

original: sems yongs su zhum pa med pa /
analyzed: sems yongs su zhum pa med pa /
translated: He was without mental lassitude.

original: sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi rgyud dang / shes pa phra ba dang / spyod pa dang / mos @4a *//🔽pa khong du chud par bya ba la mkhas pa /

translated: He was skilled in understanding the mental continuums, subtle minds, conduct, and aspirations of all sentient beings.

original: sems can thams cad la sdang ba med pa'i sems dang ldan pa /
analyzed: sems can thams cad la sdang ba med pa'i sems dang ldan pa /
translated: He had a mind that was free of hostility toward any sentient being.

original: bzod pa rlabs chen po dang ldan pa /
analyzed: bzod pa rlabs chen po dang ldan pa /
translated: He had great patience.

original: chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du rtogs par bya ba'i ye shes la mkhas pa /
analyzed: chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du rtogs par bya ba'i ye shes la mkhas pa /
translated: He was skilled in the wisdom that realizes the sameness of all phenomena.

original: chos nyid zab mo dang ldan pas gting dpag dka' ba /
analyzed: chos nyid zab mo dang ldan pas gting dpag dka' ba /
translated: He was difficult to fathom because he had the profound nature of phenomena.

original: rang gi sems la dbang rab tu thob pa /
analyzed: rang gi sems la dbang rab tu thob pa /
translated: He had attained mastery over his own mind.

original: chos thams cad la dbang shin tu thob pa /
analyzed: chos thams cad la dbang shin tu thob pa /

original: las dang / nyon mongs pa dang / lta ba'i sgrib pa thams cad las rnam par grol ba /
analyzed: las dang / nyon mongs pa dang / lta ba'i sgrib pa thams cad las rnam par grol ba /
translated: They were completely liberated from the obscurations of karma, afflictions, and views.

original: brten pa rtogs par bstan pa la mkhas pa /
analyzed: brten pa rtogs par bstan pa la mkhas pa /
translated: They were skilled in teaching the realization of the support.

original: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i tshul zad mi shes pa la bzhugs pa /
analyzed: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i tshul zad mi shes pa la bzhugs pa /

analyzed: lta ba dang / bag la nyal ba dang / kun nas ldang ba thams cad dang bral ba /
translated: They were free from all views, latent tendencies, and mental afflictions.

analyzed: kun tu sbyor ba thams cad spangs pa; las dang nyon mongs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba la mkhas pa /

analyzed: bden pa rab tu rtogs par bya ba'i ye shes la mkhas pa /

analyzed: chos thams cad sgra brnyan dang 'dra bar rtag tu rgyun mi chad par mos pa /

analyzed: bdag nyid ji lta ba bzhin du khong du chud par bya ba la mkhas pa /
